assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State define similar targets to the rest of the Member States in the region?

answers.option: Target(s) used for this descriptor is/are similar to those used most (76%-100%) of the MS in the region
Target(s) used for this criterion is/are similar to those used by more than half (51-75%) of MS in the region
Target(s) used for this criterion is/are similar to those used in less than half (26-50%) of MS in the region
Target(s) used for this criterion is/are similar to those used by few (1-25%) of MS in the region
Not relevant
Not reported

scoring.option: The MS uses the same targets as most (76%-100%)of the MS in the region
The MS uses the same targets as more than half (51-75%)of MS in the region
The MS uses the same targets as less then half (26-50%)of MS in the region
Target(s) used for this criterion is/are similar to those used by few (1-25%) of MS in the region
Not reported\the information is provided in different formats across MS and it is impossible to compare
